> <OLD - In the meeting room>
>
> At this point, as VICE GRIP came online, the first thing he did is run a
> scanner and update his files.  Upon running them over and updating his
> personnel records, he paused quietly.  "I assume that if LORD HYDRAS is
> going to make a deal with the MAXIMALS, we should take this opportunity to
> attempt to achieve some of our secondary objectives."
>
> Pausing, "We should send a team to our old base for a salvage operation, and
> keep some of our new personnel in reserve, given I assume the MAXIMALS are
> not fluent wtih..  Myself, DINOBOT, or BLACKARACHNIA.  While the main unit
> of known personnel goes to the parlay, we can have our other teams achieving
> secondary objectives and ating as a strategic reserve should it become
> necessary."
>
> And also to keep an optic upon TARANTALUS and CRYOTEK.  Glancing over to
> HYDRAS and SKY SHADOW for confirmatino of his suggestions then or secondary
> orders.

<NEW>

There was a slight nod from SKY SHADOW as he listened to VICE GRIP,
there was an assesing look from the Fuzor commander as he talked, much
like a chess player might do when sizing up a new opponant that was
about to seat itself accorss the board.

"That might be a bit premature." SKY SHADOW said after a moment, he
voice calm and reasoning. "The base the old base was detonated by a
bomb that was kept inside for just a purpose."

"Hydras believes that his chambers have survived the destruction."
SKYSHADOW glanced at HYDRAS and then back at VICE GRIP, "And that may
very well be true, but I seriously doubt that much else of the base
had surived the explosion."

> <OLD - HYDRAS - In the meeting room>
>
> "Another Prime" hissed anoyed the predacon commander when he
>  watched Leo Prime and added "Can you tell me why one of yours...
> maximals was attemping to contact one of my predacons? "

<NEW>

There was an awkward pause from LEO at first before he spoke, "My
soldiers may have been a bit . . . overzealous in their desire to
contact the Predacons." He said, kind of sidestepping the issue and
hoping that HYDRAS wouldn't ask further.

"The reason for this communication is that we have to meet and discuss
a few matters." LEO said in a blatant effort to move the conversation
away from the first topic.. "It relates to the temporary accord that
Tuscon had been trying to set up between the Predaons and the Maximals
to find out what is going on with the Dinosaurs."

In the background CRYOTEK was watching the conversation although not
in direct view of the camera, there was an interested sparkle in his
optic as the conversation opened.

Meanwhile down in the cargo bay several decks below the meeting room
TARANTULUS was also listening through the link from BLACKARACHNIA.
There was a slight cackle as he opened a heavily encrypted comlink to
someone off ship, he began speaking in low tones with a slight cackle.

(TAG)

Preston
